about_text: I am a Junior Web Developer currently based in Berlin, with roots in a rural area of NRW, Germany. Throughout my career, I have explored various fields related to communication, such as PR, marketing, and journalism. However, my true passion has always been coding and building webpages. So, in early 2022, I overcame my fears and pursued my dream of learning JavaScript on my own. In April 2023, I successfully completed a 6-month Full-Stack Web Development course with CareerFoundry, where I gained expertise in MongoDB, Express, React, Node, and Angular. I am proud of the outstanding projects I have completed and the vast amount of new knowledge I have acquired during the course. I have never been more passionate and fired up about anything else before. It may sound huge, and it is! I am eager to join a brilliant team where I can contribute my skills and continue to grow. If you know of any opportunities, please take your time to review my projects and feel free to contact me. I look forward to hearing from you!
project_mequal_react: The client-side of a movie-app, build as a single-page application, allows users to create an account, logging in, save and remove movies as their favorites in a list, search a bulk of movies by title, receive information about them and updating and deleting their user profile.
project_api_movies: The server-side component of a movies web application. It provides users with access to information about different movies, directors, and genres. Users are able to sign up, update their personal information, and create a list of their favorite movies.
project_meetUp: A serverless, progressive web application (PWA) build with React, using a test-driven development (TDD) technique. The application uses the Google Calendar API to fetch upcoming events.
project_pokedex: A simple app built with HTML, CSS and JavaScript that uses an external API and enables the viewing of data points in detail.
project_inTouch: inTouch is a chat app for mobile devices using React Native. The app provides users with a chat interface and options to share images and their location.
project_mequal_angular: The client-side of a movie-app, build as a single-page application, allows users to create an account, logging in, save and remove movies as their favorites in a list, receive information about them and updating and deleting their user profile.
contact_text1: Now let me know about you!
